item.description:
Friday's performance was cancelled due to a fire in a nearby building. New showtimes are listed below...

Presenting a benefit performance of The Vagina Monologues, with 100% of the proceeds to benefit Sexual Assault Support Services (SASS)

The Vagina Monologues by Eve Ensler, has been hailed by The New York Times as "funny" and "poignant" and by the Daily News as "intelligent" and "courageous".

This groundbreaking show gives voice to a chorus of lusty, outrageous, thoughtful and thoroughly human stories diving into the mystery, humor, pain, power, wisdom, outrage and excitement buried in women’s experiences.

Back Alley Productions and V-Day Portsmouth 2013 have partnered with Seacoast Repertory Theater to present a benefit performance of The Vagina Monologues, with 100% of the proceeds to benefit Sexual Assault Support Services (SASS), as well as 10% of that going globally to V-Day.

V-Day is a global activist movement to end violence against women and girls. By creating this global community, V-Day strives to empower women to find their collective voices and demand an end to the violence that affects one in three women in the U.S and around the world.


For more information about Sexual Assault Support Services (SASS), please visit www.sassnh.org

For more information about V-Day, please visit www.vday.org

. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .
PURCHASE YOUR OWN TICKETS for this event:


~Saturday February 2nd 7pm (8pm showtime)
~Sunday February 3rd at 1pm (2pm showtime)

COST: $25.00 General Admission
$20.00 Students/Seniors

To purchase tickets online visit http://www.seacoastrep.org/
Box Office: 603-433-4472 Box Office Email: boxoffice@seacoastrep.org

* PLEASE BRING EXTRA CASH WITH YOU!
In addition to our performance of the Vagina Monologues, there will be many delightful items for sale in the lobby, including a Raffle, Beautiful Locally Handmade Art, and Delicious Goodies.

 

Liability Release

AS A CONDITION OF ATTENDING THIS MEETUP, YOU AGREE TO hold harmless, and indemnify the organizer and his heirs, and all members and participants of the Seacoast Outdoors Meetup group from any and all claims for injury, illness, death, and/or property damage including those caused by negligence, ignorance, inexperience and other reasons. You also agree to assume all mental, physical, financial, and/or other risk associated with this meetup. Kayaking, camping, hiking, bicycling, snow sports, alcohol consumption, and other activities pose inherent risks and dangers. Participation in these activities is voluntary and dependent upon your own personal judgment.


Time and location are subject to change due to weather and other factors.  Always check email & this listing for updates before leaving home.
item.name: V-DAY Benefit: The VAGINA MONOLOGUES
